== Introduction ==

Welcome to the PAT (Pentaho Analysis Tool) Wiki!

This wiki is source of information for users and developers of PAT.

== What Is PAT? ==

What we aim to create is a GWT based analysis tool designed to replace JPivot and work along side the Pentaho suite, giving end users better control of their data.

== Latest News ==
